Room.Name: Sunken Pirate Ship
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing on the forward bow of Morgan's ship, the Snap Dragon.
Room.LongDescription: Extending from the bow, below the water line, is a sturdy ramming pike covered with steel plate. It appears to be a deadly ship-killer, able to pierce another ships side and flood it with seawater. Captain Morgan was one of the most feared pirates on the Respitial Sea, responsible for sinking over a thousand merchant craft. Now you see one of his methods.
